column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi kowia nantwi
column3: anaa guan
column5: anaa ɔtɔn no a; ɔmfa anantwi enum nhyɛ nantwi kor ananmu
column6: na nguan anan nhyɛ guan kor ananmu ntua kaw."

column2: "Sɛ wohu owifo no dɛ oebubu mu reba
column3: na wɔbɔ no adze ma owu a
column4: bɔgya asodzi nnyi hɔ mma no."

column2: "Sɛ ewia pue no do a
column3: bɔgya asodzi wɔ hɔ ma no: ahyɛnanmu na ɔnyɛ; sɛ onnyi hwee a

column2: "Sɛ wohu adzewiadze no wɔ ne nsamu enyikan a
column3: sɛ ɔyɛ ɔnantwi o

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi ma wodzi haban anaa wenyin ture mu adze
column3: na ogyaa n’abowa ma okedzi nyimpa kor so ne haban mu adze a
column4: ɔmfa nankasa ne haban mu ndzepa
column5: nye nankasa no wenyin ture mu ndzepa bi nhyɛ ananmu."

column2: "Sɛ ogya pue
column3: na ɔkɔsɔ nsoɛ mu ma eburow ekuwekuw
column5: anaa haban no hyew a; ɔhyɛ na nyia ɔsɔɔ gya no nhyɛ ananmu."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi dze sika anaa efidze ma ne nyɛnko esie
column3: na wowia no wɔ nyimpa no ne fie a; sɛ wohu owifo no a

column2: "Sɛ woennhu owifo no a
column3: ɔno fiwura no ntwe mbɛn Nyankopɔn nhwɛ kyerɛ dɛ ɔnntsen ne nsa nnka ne nyɛnko n’adze no a."

column2: "Na mbrato ho asɛm biara
column3: sɛ ɔyɛ ɔnantwi dze o
column6: anaa adze a ayew biara a obi bɛse wɔ ho dɛ
column8: wɔmfa hɔn beenu nyina hɔn asɛm mbra Nyankopɔn enyim; nyia Nyankopɔn bobu no fɔ no
column9: ontua kaw mbɔho mma ne nyɛnko no."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi dze asoaso
column3: anaa nantwi
column5: anaa abowa biara ma ne nyɛnko esie; na owu anaa opira

column2: "EWURADZE ntam mbra hɔn beenu no ntamu
column3: kyerɛ dɛ ɔnntsen ne nsa nnka ne nyɛnko no n’adze no a: na adze no wura no ɔmpen do

column2: "Sɛ wowia no wɔ ne nkyɛn dze a
column3: ɔnhyɛ adze no wura ananmu."

column2: "Sɛ wɔatsetsew no esinesin a
column3: ɔmfa mbra mbedzi dase; dza wɔatsetsew no no mma ɔnnhyɛ ananmu."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi kɛfɛm biribi wɔ ne nyɛnko hɔ
column3: na ɔsɛɛ
column5: dɛ adze no wura no no ho nnyi mu a

column2: "Sɛ adze no wura no no ho wɔ mu a
column3: mma ɔnnhyɛ ananmu: sɛ ɔyɛ apaabɔ adze a

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi kɛdaadaa ɔbaabun a wɔnngyee no yer
column3: na ɔnye no da a
column4: ɔno ɔmma ne tsiadze ma ɔnyɛ ne yer."

column2: "Sɛ n’egya pow koraa dɛ ɔdze no ma no a
column3: onker sika mma

column2: "Mma mma ɔbaa anyɛn kwan ma ɔntsena ase."
"Obiara a ɔnye abowa bɛda no
column3: oku na wonku no."

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔbɔ afɔr ama onyame biara
column3: na nnyɛ EWURADZE nko no

column2: "Na ɔhɔho dze mma nnyɛ no bɔn
column3: nkyii so mma nnhaw no: osiandɛ hom yɛɛ ahɔho wɔ Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Mma hom nntseetsee ɔbaa kunafo biara
column3: anaa egyankaba."

column2: "Sɛ etseetsee hɔn ɔkwan biara mu
column3: na wosu frɛ me dze a
column4: otsie ara na mibetsie hɔn sufrɛ no;"

column2: "na m’ebufuw ano bɛyɛ dzen
column3: na medze afona boku hom; na hom yernom bɛyɛ ekunafo na hom mba ayɛ ngyanka."

column2: "Sɛ efɛm me man mu ohianyi biara a ɔnye wo wɔ hɔ sika a
column3: mma nnyɛ dɛ ɔpempensinyi; nkyii so mma hom nngye no nsiho."

column2: "Sɛ egye wo nyɛnko tam ahoba a
column3: wi rotɔ no fa san ma no:"

column2: "osiandɛ ɔnoara nko nye n’akataho
column3: no honam ho tam a: ebɛnadze na ɔmfa nda? Na ɔbɛba dɛ

column2: "Mma nnyeyaw Nyankopɔn
column3: anaa nndom wo man mu ɔpanyin."

column2: "Mma nnkyinkyim dɛ edze wo ndɔbaa anaa wo nsa mu bi bɔbɔ afɔr. Wo mbabanyin mu abakan no fa ma me."
"Dɛmara na yɛ w’anantwi
column3: na ɔnye wo nguan: nda esuon na ɔnye ne na ntsena; da a otsia awɔtwe no fa no brɛ me."

column2: "Na hom bɛyɛ nyimpa krɔnkrɔn ama me: dɛm ntsi mma hom nndzi bɔnam bi a abowa atsetsew mu wɔ haban mu; hom ntow nkyen mbɔdɔm."
